sub_title: Lonza şirketinde QA Senior Validation Specialist
summary: Atamturk Cakin grew up in Istanbul, Turkey, and graduated from the Istanbul Technical University as a Meteorological Engineer. He is a lifelong student and also officially he is a master student in Mechanical Engineering Programme in Istanbul Arel University.  In August 2021, He moved to the Netherlands with a passion for acquiring new experiences and started to work as a Senior QA Validation Specialist at Lonza AG. He completed the project by taking part in the validation and qualification studies in the production of the Covid-19 vaccine in Lonza. He is currently working on GMP improvements on his site.

profile_positions.description:
✓ Review of Qualification & Validation & Calibration document (In-house or third party validation protocol / reports) and support SOP generation (In Documentum) & improvement revisions (Reffering to GAMP 5, EU GMP, and other technical documents like ISO, ISPE, DIN etc.) about Cleanrooms, Gas Networks, HVAC, all kind of Facilities and Utilities, BSC, TCUs, Steam Generators, Autoclaves and Passboxes, 
✓ Using quality system related software (Trackwise) for GxP processes (Change control process (identification, implementation, review etc.), Deviation processes (root cause analysis, review etc.), CAPA processes, Risk analysis, Gap analysis,
✓ Perform periodic performance reviews on Facilities, Utilities, BSCs and TCUs and to determine qualification status and necessary actions for continuty of system life cycle,
✓ Implementation of Moderna mRNA Covid-19 Vaccine Production Project / QA Role for Qualification and Validation activities for entire project
profile_positions.title: QA Senior Validation Specialist

profile_positions.description:
✓ Leading all Qualification & Validation activities for new Plasma Fractionation Facility,
✓ Review of Qualification & Validation document (ChemEngineering, In-house or third party validation protocol / reports) and support SOP generation & improvement revisions (Reffering to GAMP 5, EU GMP, and other technical documents like ISO, ISPE, DIN etc.),
profile_positions.title: Qualification & Validation Team Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
- To prepare and manage the weekly and monthly work plan of the QA Validation & Qualification Team, to manage team (8 specialists (Two of them are subcontractor.)), to prepare and follow up the Annual Validation Master Plans,
- Collection of KPI data and  to review them on a weekly and monthly basis for presentation of KPI analysis,
- To prepare department budget and follow-up monthly,
- To make risk analysis for processes, equipment and changes and to determine the subsequent actions,
- To review installation (IQ), operational (OQ) and performance qualification (PQ) of  GMP-critical sterile and solid production equipment, utilities and laboratory equipments, calibration certificates, qualification and re-qualification and mapping studies of Temperature Controlled Volumes (Laboratory equipment, Warehouse, Cold rooms etc.) and cleanroom test reports,
- Planning and managing responsible activities of Validation & Qualification Team:
- GMP-Critical Equipment Qualification     - Process Validation                    - Cleaning Validation     
- Computerized System Validation             - Mediafill Process Validation     - Filter Validation
- Transfer and Cold Chain Validation         - Disinfectant Validation
- Sterile Area Personal Qualification          - Optical Control Personal Qualification
- To prepare all the procedures related to the Validation & Qualification Team within the Trackwise and Documentum,
- Technology Transfer management, to identify new product requirements and to provide production information and  feasibility reports about new products, preperation of TT plan,
profile_positions.title: QA Validation & Qualification Team Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
- To make the monthly plan of the Validation Team and manage the team (1 specialist and 3 technicians),
- Preparation and follow-up of the Annual Validation Master Plan,
- To perform risk analysis and to determine the actions to be taken,
- To perform installation (IQ), operational (OQ) and performance qualifications (PQ) & routine re-qualification and validations of GMP-critical equipment (Autoclaves, lyophilizers, production tanks, sterilization / depyrogenization tunnel, washing machine, filling machine, capping machine, RABS system, tablet press machine, parts washer, etc.) (By Kaye Validator or Ellab Validation Systems)
- To perform installation & operational validation and periodic re-validation of laboratory equipment (refrigerator, deep freeze, stability cabins, air-conditioning cabins, ovens, cold / cool areas, water baths, etc.),
- To perform temperature and humidity mapping studies of warehouse, weighing areas and conditioned areas, 
- To perform classification studies of field and equipment's, 
- To perform Utility (Pressurized Air & Nitrogen Line), HVAC qualifications and Air Flow Visualization (Smoke test) Tests,
- Upon successful completion of qualification tests, to submit the equipment to the  system owner  with the qualification summary report, and to ensure that all changes to be made are followed up with the change control department via the Qmex program,
- To prepare the SOPs related to the Validation Unit, to submit it for approval, to ensure its distribution,
Commissioning activities under my supervision: 
-Waldner Isolators (SAT)
-Legacy 6100 Tableting Machine (SAT)
-Steris Parts Washers (FAT/SAT)
-IMA Lyophilizers (SAT-Validation Activities)
-Mobius Tank (SAT)
-IP Tablet Printing Machine (SAT)
-Tablet Dryer (SAT)
-OCS Checkweighers (SAT)
-Lighthouse Particulate Monitoring System (SAT)
-PMS Particulate Monitoring System (SAT)
-JRI Temperature & Humidity Monitoring System (SAT)
profile_positions.title: Validation Team Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
- Comprehensive project management, Planning of equipment and critical systems qualification and re-qualification,
- Preparation of qualification / re-qualification (IQ / OQ / PQ) protocols and tests, to perform tests, collecting, evaluating and reporting the results of the studies,
- To carry out risk analysis and to determine the actions to be taken.
- To prepare the functional specifications, design specifications and safety documents after the purchase decision and ordering,
- Upon successful completion of qualification tests, to submit the equipment to system owner with the qualification summary report, and to ensure that all changes to be made are followed up with the change control via the Qmex program,
- To ensure the validated status of the equipment by periodic reviews,
- To prepare the SOPs, to submit it for approval, to ensure its distribution,
profile_positions.title: Qualification Specialist

profile_positions.description:
- Management of Import & Export operations,
- Profit and Loss responsibility for 26 different brands in Test & Measurement, Industrial Equipments
- Preparation of annual business plan for existing brands,
- Development of 3 to 5 years as long term business plan for new brands including Sales Strategy, Marketing Strategy and Financial Plans,
- Development of new distributor relationship and new brands outside of Turkey,
- Attends international trade shows and fairs in order to following market trends and new products,
- Exhibit national trade shows and fairs in order to present current products,
- Relationship management with all 26 distributors,
- Key Account Management responsibility for big projects.
profile_positions.title: External Relations Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Managing the customer relationships and get customer satisfaction with continuously,
- Making Turkish market research to refine customer potential,
- Responsible for all domestic sales operations of related brands,
- Determine customer requirements and inform them about new products,
- To follow up the exhibitions and find new customers, new marketing areas,
- Preparing customer visit reports and report to Sales Manager,
- Managing the marketing activities depending the market situation, total demand and stock position etc.
- Finding promt and best solution for customer requirements,
- Organizing the orders delivery on time,
- Giving technical support after sales actions,
- Giving technical training to users for hardware and software about products,
- Making IQ / OQ Protocols for Monitoring Systems,
- Specializing on Meteorological Sensors, Weather Stations, Monitoring Systems, Calibrators, Industrial Portable Devices etc.
profile_positions.title: Meteorological Engineer / Project Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description: In this community, the first steps were taken on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of ICCCS (International Confederation of Contamination Control Societies) celebrated in ISCC’22 Antalya symposium,  it was aimed to bring together young professionals in the contamination control world, to share experience and knowledge, to organize trainings and educations via cleanroom and contamination control experts.
